mapper.insert: insert into tb_member (mem_id, mem_pw, mem_phone,mem_name, mem_email, mem_phone_open, joined_at) values(#{mem_id}, #{mem_pw}, #{mem_phone}, #{mem_name},#{mem_email},#{mem_phone_open}, NOW())
mapper.select: select * from tb_member where mem_id = #{mem_id} and mem_pw = #{mem_pw}
select mem_phone from tb_member where mem_id = #{mem_id} and mem_phone_open = 1
